meanings.definition: Full of or characterized by fashion or style.
meanings.sent1: She always wears the most fashious clothes to school.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured many fashious outfits.
meanings.sent3: Her fashious sense of style always turns heads.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with fashious people during the event.
meanings.sent5: The boutique displayed a fashious collection of dresses.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be easily offended or upset.
meanings.sent1: He is quite fashious and gets upset over small things.
meanings.sent2: She is known for being fashious and taking things personally.
meanings.sent3: His fashious reaction to the joke surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The fashious customer demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent5: The fashious child started crying over a minor mistake.

meanings.definition: Inclined to make a fuss or show off.
meanings.sent1: She is fashious about her achievements and always brags.
meanings.sent2: The fashious guest kept talking about their expensive possessions.
meanings.sent3: His fashious behavior at the party annoyed the other guests.
meanings.sent4: The fashious celebrity arrived with a large entourage.
meanings.sent5: The fashious display of fireworks lit up the night sky.
